input_vector.description: realized_vol=None, target_vol=None -- vol_adjustment identity.
realized_vol > target_vol -- vol_adjustment < 1.0.
realized_vol < target_vol -- vol_adjustment > 1.0.
Extreme vol scaling: ratio hits 3.0 cap.
High-vol returns with vol scaling active.
Normal returns: no risk compression from DD path.
High-DD returns: risk compression triggered by DD path.
Boundary returns: no compression expected.
High-vol returns: risk compression triggered by vol path.
meta_uncertainty=0.0 -- no uncertainty penalty.
meta_uncertainty=1.0 -- E_pre_clip forced to zero; Clip B floor active.
meta_uncertainty=0.5 -- 50% uncertainty penalty.
meta_uncertainty near 1.0 -- near-zero exposure.
regime_posterior=None -- posterior_confidence identity 1.0.
regime_posterior=0.0 -- capital_base forced to zero; Clip B floor.
regime_posterior=1.0 -- full posterior confidence.
regime_posterior=0.5 -- halves capital_base.
regime_posterior above 1.0 -- silent clip to 1.0.
regime_posterior below 0.0 -- silent clip to 0.0.
JRM inactive: both None -- joint_multiplier=1.0, Clip C suppressed.
RISK_ON/DIVERGENCE -- joint_multiplier=1.0, Clip C suppressed.
RISK_OFF/BREAKDOWN -- multiplier=2.0, Clip C active, floor enforced.
correlation_regime set but macro_regime=None -- JRM inactive.
TRANSITION/COUPLED -- multiplier=1.35, Clip C active.
RISK_OFF/DIVERGENCE -- multiplier=1.40, Clip C active.
CRISIS regime, JRM inactive: dampening applied after Clip B.
CRISIS regime + JRM active: dampening applied after Clip C.
Non-CRISIS with JRM active: no dampening applied.
CRISIS + high-DD: both CRISIS and DD compression active.
BC pair 1A: no optional params.
BC pair 1B: all optional params at identity defaults.
BC pair 2A: no optional params, high vol.
BC pair 2B: all optional params at identity defaults.
BC pair 3A: CRISIS regime, no optional params.
BC pair 3B: all optional params at identity defaults.
Empty returns: expect ValueError (< 20 returns).
19 returns: expect ValueError (< 20 minimum).
